ModMetaData.name: Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.4[/h1]
My milkshake brings all the modders to the yard.
This mod adds 6 new craftable recreation/luxury food, and introduces a berry sorting recipe to split mixed berries into blueberries and strawberries.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (1) for 12 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Ambrosia Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (5) for 18 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Blueberry Milkshakes [*]Strawberry Milkshakes [*]Mixed Berry Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (2) for 18 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Chocolate Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (3) for 24 hours after consumption.
[h1]Want to mix and match instead? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595720152]Milkshakes - Collector's Edition[/url][/h1]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] [b]- Recommended for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] users. Incompatible with the other RimFantasy mods.[/b]
